speakers.name: Rishikesh Kale
speakers.description: One of the best blockchain developers in the country He's an early builder at Filecoin and has also won more than 6 major Web3 Hackathons.

speakers.name: Anshul Rustaggi
speakers.description: Creator of ZionVerse, India's own metaverse, with unmatched expertise in virtual gaming and NFTs.

speakers.name: Abhishek Bhaskar
speakers.role: Beatboxer, Emcee, NFT Artist, Metaverse Designer, Architect
speakers.description: Creator of The Metavoice Project: World's 1st Beatboxing generated Digital NFT Art and a web3 evangelist.

speakers.name: Daniel Akpobare
speakers.description: Currently associated with Calyptus - A platform that helps web developers transition to full-stack blockchain developers. He is one of the pioneers of Blockchain adoption in Africa.

speakers.name: Shreya Bahu
speakers.role: Head of Blockchain at Narra8ive, Solana Foundation Tutor
speakers.description: Head of Blockchain at Narra8ive and a coveted tutor at Solana Foundation.

speakers.name: Shubham Raj

speakers.name: Stefano Calandriello
speakers.description: The Founder of Pizza Wallet. Pizza Wallet aims to makes the process of setting up a wallet as easy as eating a slice of pizza. The ease of web2 with the security of web3.

speakers.name: Prashant Yadav
